token.title: API token
token.description: A Qualaroo token. See the docs for instructions on how to generate it.

key.title: API key
key.description: A Qualaroo token. See the docs for instructions on how to generate it.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated.

survey_ids.title: Qualaroo survey IDs
survey_ids.description: IDs of the surveys from which you'd like to replicate data. If left empty, data from all surveys to which you have access will be replicated.
